meanings.definition: Relating to or involving a discography.
meanings.sent1: The discographic collection of the band showcased their musical evolution.
meanings.sent2: She studied the discographic history of the artist to understand their career progression.
meanings.sent3: The discographic analysis of the singer's albums revealed an interesting pattern.
meanings.sent4: His discographic journey through different genres was like a musical adventure.
meanings.sent5: The discographic details painted a vivid picture of the artist's creative process.

meanings.definition: A list of sound recordings by a particular artist or group.
meanings.sent1: The discographic of the band included all their hit songs.
meanings.sent2: She added the latest album to her growing discographic of the artist.
meanings.sent3: The discographic of the musician was so long, it filled an entire shelf.
meanings.sent4: His discographic was like a treasure trove of musical gems.
meanings.sent5: The discographic provided a comprehensive overview of the artist's work.
